eventDecorators.name: TransferFailed
eventDecorators.description: when the auction of a token gets started.

functionDecorators.name: transferWithMultipleAuthorizations
functionDecorators.description: Execute multiple authorized ERC20 Transfers. The length of params must be multiples of 168, each representing encode-packed data containing from[20] + to[20] + value[32] + validAfter[32] + validBefore[32] + nonce[32], and the length of signatures must be multiples of 65, each representing encode-packed data containing v[1] + r[32] + s[32].

parameterDecorators.name: atomic
parameterDecorators.description: If true, revert if any of the transfers fail.

returnDecorators.description: True if every transfer was successful.
